FileFormat.FormatDescription: CorelDraw (styled CorelDRAW) is a vector graphics editor developed and marketed by Corel Corporation of Ottawa, Canada. It is also the name of Corel's Graphics Suite, which bundles CorelDraw with bitmap-image editor Corel Photo-Paint as well as other graphics-related programs.
FileFormat.ProvenanceName: Museum of London / Museum of London
FileFormat.ProvenanceDescription: 08/2023 (v.113) - Added priority over fmt/1886 (Resource Interchange Format (RIFF)). Submitted by New York Public Libraries and Preservica; 11/2023 (v.115)- Modified the offset values in the internal signature from null to 0 as part of a project to match PRONOM data with the xsd standard. Internally researched.

InternalSignature.SignatureNote: RIFF (little-endian) or RIFX (big-endian) Form labeled CDRCvrsn (C=12)
